name: Chell
description: The silent test subject controlled by the player. Chell navigates the Aperture Science testing facility using the portal gun.

name: GLaDOS
description: An artificial intelligence overseeing the test chambers. GLaDOS begins as a helpful guide but gradually reveals a sinister and manipulative personality.

name: Aperture Science Personality Cores
description: Small, spherical AI modules attached to GLaDOS. Each core represents a specific personality trait or function, including the Morality Core, Curiosity Core, and Anger Core.

name: Weighted Companion Cube
description: A weighted storage cube given to the player during one of the test chambers. GLaDOS encourages an emotional attachment to it before instructing Chell to destroy it.
